sections.heading: suggestion system; awards; paid from appropriated money saved
sections.text: No agency, board, or commission shall receive additional appropriations to carry out sections 81-1346 to 81-1354 except the personnel division of the Department of Administrative Services which shall be allocated funds to administer such

81-1353.Employee suggestion system; awards; paid from appropriated money saved.

No agency, board, or commission shall receive additional appropriations to carry out sections 81-1346 to 81-1354 except the personnel division of the Department of Administrative Services which shall be allocated funds to administer such sections. All awards shall be made from the amount of appropriated money saved by the suggestions of employees.

SourceLaws 1978, LB 286, ยง 8;Laws 1992, Third Spec. Sess., LB 14, ยง 23.
